com.mousebird.maply

Class ColorRampGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mousebird.maply.ColorRampGenerator

  • public class ColorRampGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    The color ramp generator will take a set of color values and generate a linear ramp of those colors in an output image. You typically feed the color ramp image into a shader.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean stretch
      If set we'll stretch the colors out to the whole image On by default

    • Constructor Summary
